page.title: 06An Office Furniture Business
page.content: Shaw's Office Supplies is situated on Sodylt Farm. They sell desks, tables, filing cabinets and chairs as well as steel cupboards, drawing boards and safes. They get all the wooden items from Wrexham where they are made just for Shaw's. A coffee table, 24" by 18" costs Â£24 and a filing cabinet with 4 drawers cost Â£67. The wooden desks are teak or sapele finish. The person incharge of Shaw's has been there for about 30 years. Second hand goods which are in good condition are bought and are sold at almost the same price. This firm is competitive and does a lot of business in the area.
